td6.view

Class CompoundFigure

  • java.lang.Object
    • td6.view.Figure
      • td6.view.CompoundFigure
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Ghost, GhostDoor, Heart, Number, Numbers, PacMan

    public class CompoundFigure
extends Figure
    A figure composed of one or more figures
    Invariants :
    getFigures() != null && getFigures().length > 0

      • CompoundFigure

        public CompoundFigure(Figure[] figures)
        Initialize a compound figure composed of the gievn figures
        Parameters:
        figures - the figures that compose the compound figure
        Preconditions :
        figures != null && figures.length > 0

      • CompoundFigure

        public CompoundFigure(int nbFigures)
        Initialize a compound figure composed of the gievn figures
        Parameters:
        nbFigures - the number of figures that compose the compound figure
        Preconditions :
        nbFigures > 0

      • move

        public void move(int dx,
                 int dy)
        Change the location of the upper left corner of the figure bounding rectangle
        Overrides:
        move in class Figure
        Parameters:
        dx - number of pixels to move the figure to the right (dx>0) or left (dx<0)
        dy - number of pixels to move the figure to the bottom (dy>0) or top (dy<0)
